Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.model.gameoperations.rules

Class MRules

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.model.gameoperations.rules.Rules<MState,​MRules>
it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.model.gameoperations.rules.MRules
All Implemented Interfaces:
ApplicableMRules, ApplicableRules<MState,​MRules>, ExpandableMRules, ExpandableRules<MState,​MRules>, RulesConvertible<MState,​MRules>
public class MRules
extends Rules<MState,​MRules>
implements ApplicableMRules, ExpandableMRules
Brief Move Rules are Rules dedicated entirely to the Move GameOperation
See Also:
Move
